column4: I made a partition in cfdisk called /dev/hda4. When I now try to format it with the mkfs.ext3 /dev/hda4 command it say it cannot find anything. What's wrong?
I made a partition in cfdisk called /dev/hda4. When I now try to format it with the mkfs.ext3 /dev/hda4 command it say it cannot find anything. Any ideas?
try a reboot, or perhaps blockdev --rereadpt /dev/hda
